pages.text: 20|88|phir vah[1] nikaal laaya unake lie ek bachhade kee moorti, jisakee gaay jaisee dhvani (aavaaz) thee, to sabane kahaah ye hai tumhaara poojy tatha moosa ka poojy, (parantu) moosa ise bhool gaya hai.
20|89|to kya ve nahin dekhate ki vah na unakee kisee baat kee uttar deta hai aur na adhikaar rakhata hai, unake lie kisee haani ka, na kisee laabh ka

20|90|aur kah diya tha haaroon ne isase pahale hee ki he meree jaati ke logo! tumhaaree pareeksha kee gayee hai isake dvaara aur vaastav mein tumhaara paalanahaar atyant krpaasheel hai. atah mera anusaran karo tatha mere aadesh ka paalan karo.
20|91|unhonne kahaah hamasab usee ke pujaaree rahenge, jab tak (toor se) hamaare paas moosa vaapas na aa jaaye.
20|92|moosa ne kahaah he haaroon! kis baat ne tujhe rok diya, jab toone unhen dekha ki kupath ho gaye
20|93|ki mera anusaran na kare? kya toone avagya kar dee mere aadesh kee

20|94|usane kahaah mere maan jaaye bhaee! meree daadhee na pakad aur na mera sir. vaastav mein, mujhe bhay hua ki aap kahenge ki toone vibhed utpann kar diya banee israeel mein aur[1] prateeksha nahin kee meree baat (aadesh) kee.
20|95|(moosa ne) poochhaah tera samaachaar kya hai, he saamaree
20|96|usane kahaah mainne vah cheez dekhee, jise unhonne nahin dekha, to mainne le lee ek mutthee rasool ke padchinh se, phir use phenk diya aur isee prakaar sujha diya mujhe[1] mere man ne.

20|97|moosa ne kahaah ja tere lie jeevan mein ye hona hai ki too kahata raheh mujhe sparsh na karana[1]. tatha tere lie ek aur[2] vachan hai, jisake virudhd kadaapi na hoga aur apane poojy ko dekh, jisaka pujaaree bana raha, ham avashy use jala denge, phir use uda denge nadee mein choor-choor karake.
20|98|nihsandeh tum sabhee ka poojy, bas allaah hai, koee poojy nahin hai, usake siva. vah samoye hue hai, pratyek vastu ko (apane) gyaan mein.
